DOC.brief_summary: Rate of appendix localization on ultrasound is not high. We suggest a way to improve it's localization by oral administration of iodinated contrast material.
DOC.brief_title: Improvement of Appendix Identification and Appendicitis Diagnosis in us After Administration of Oral Contrast Medium
DOC.detailed_description: The administration of oral iodinated contrast material might facilitate identification of the appendix and accurate diagnosis of appendicitis. When indicated will shorten time to CT examination.
DOC.criteria: patients in emergency department with right lower quadrant pain patients under 18 years old pregnant women
